data.title: Mota-Engil July2021
data.meta_description: Mota-Engil_July2021 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This investor presentation provides an overview of Mota-Engil Group for 2021. It includes a snapshot of the company's history and milestones, highlights of a new partnership with CCCC, and summaries of its activities, geographic presence, and key metrics. Mota-Engil has operations in Europe, Africa, and Latin America, with activities including engineering and construction, waste management, energy, transport, and mining. Financial results for 2020 show total turnover of €2.4 billion and EBITDA of €380 million. The order book reached over €6 billion for the first time in the company's history.
